news.title: For first-time job hunters, a college degree isn't unlocking the opportunities it once did
news.summary: Data shows young college grads are feeling the brunt of the labor market slowdown. Data shows young College Grads are Feeling The brunt of The Labor Market Slowdown. The U.S. economy is slowing.

news.title: Goldman boss David Solomon warns of a stock market drawdown: ‘People won’t feel good’
news.summary: Goldman Sachs CEO: Some investors are overlooking "things you should be skeptical about" He said AI presented opportunities, but some investors were overlooking “things you shouldn't be skeptical of"

news.title: Trump administration puts on hold $2.1 billion in Chicago infrastructure projects, Vought says
news.summary: The move came on the third day of the federal government shutdown. President Donald Trump has blamed the shutdown on Democrats in Congress. The shutdown is now in its third day.

news.title: Why vinyl records like Taylor Swift's 'The Life of a Showgirl' are protected from tariffs
news.summary: Vinyl records, CDs and cassettes escape U.S. tariffs thanks to a Cold War-era exemption. The exemption keeps prices stable for fans.

news.title: The wealth of the top 1% reaches a record $52 trillion
news.summary: All wealth groups saw gains over the past year, according to recent Fed data. But the growth has been fastest for those at the very top.

news.title: Market bubbles only burst when central banks tighten — and there’s so sign of that happening, says B. of A. strategist Hartnett
news.summary: Bank of America chief strategist Michael Hartnett remains reluctant to call a top in markets. He says he's not sure if the market is at a top. He also says he doesn't think the U.S. economy is in a recession.

news.title: The AI bubble is 17 times the size of the dot-com frenzy — and four times subprime, this analyst argues
news.summary: A research firm is arguing snot just that AI is in a bubble, but one 17 times the size of the dot-com bubble.

news.title: Magnificence beyond the Magnificent 7? Here’s the next generation of AI winners powering the stock market.
news.summary: Wall Street's tech darlings are losing their shine in 2025. A new class of large-cap companies is rewriting the S&P 500 leaderboard and powering the next phase of the AI boom.

news.title: Why the silver squeeze is finally about to end, analyst says
news.summary: TD Securities analyst warns that the squeeze in silver prices is reaching a crescendo. A TD Securities analyst is warning that the squeezed silver prices are reaching aCrescendon.

news.title: These AI ‘loser’ stocks were left for dead. Now it might be their turn to rally.
news.summary: Some of the biggest AI losers of the year are quietly building powerful comeback stories. From Salesforce to Duolingo, here's why their stocks deserve a second look.
